'''"Warmth"''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Miso Soup]] with [[Thoma]]. The recipe for Miso Soup is available from [[Shimura Kanbei]] in [[Inazuma City]] for 1,250 [[Mora]].

"Warmth" restores 14% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 350 HP every 5s for 30s. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
